title: You can now connect Fitbit and Google Fit with Assistant, but not yet live on Nest Hub
content:
We spotted how the Nest Hub is getting deeper Google Fit and Fitbit integration to let you see step count and other activity stats at the start of this month, and you can now connect either service to Assistant settings.
